HSCv3: select * from dbo.SearchDetailedCatalog({0}, {1}, {2}, 0) order by det desc, 2,3,4
TESS_TIC_7: SELECT 60 * n.distance, o.ra, o.dec, Tmag, o.e_Tmag from fGetNearbyObjEq({0}, {1}, {2} / 60.)  n join catalogRecord o on o.objID = n.objID order by 1
ATLAS_refcat: SELECT 60 * n.distance, o.* from fGetNearbyObjEq({0}, {1}, {2} / 3600.) n join refcat2 o on o.objID = n.objID order by 1
SDSS_spectra: SELECT 60 * n.distance, o.ra, o.dec, class, o.specObjID, survey, o.plate, o.z from fGetNearbySpecObjAllEq({0}, {1}, {2} / 60.)  n join SpecObjAll o on o.specObjID = n.specObjID order by 1
